snippet.title: Adventures of TinTin: Official Trailer (E3 2011)
snippet.description:
This new video game is based on the exciting new movie The Adventures of TinTin, directed by Steven Spielberg. Check out the trailer from E3 2011.

IGN's YouTube is just a taste of our content. Get more:
http://www.ign.com

Want this week's top videos? Sign up:
http://go.ign.com/VideoRound-up
